job.title: Machine Learning Data Scientist
job.description: pemABOUT ITEMIZEnbspemppItemize is a leading AI company that transforms financial documents into valuable and efficient information sets for business systems We harness AI to transform unstructured and semistructured data in purchase documents such as invoices and receipts into structured data for accounts payable and accounting systemsppOur intelligent document processing technology empowers financial teams to focus on highervalue activities by liberating them from laborious and costly data entry and reconciliation tasks which remain manual processesppItemize operations are cloudbased with a fully remote team distributed nationwide The company runs on an East Coast schedule We welcome people who enjoy the challenge of a fastpaced highgrowth environment on the leading edge of B2B enterprise technologynbspppbrppemABOUT THE ROLEemppThe Machine Learning Data Scientist will join a team of engineers innovating new techniques for applying Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning and data analytics techniques to transform unstructured images and files into financial data setsnbspppThe Machine Learning Data Scientists responsibilities will includepulliDevelop machinelearning models services and modules for document classification and information extractionnbspliliBuild pipelines and processes for model development experimentation and scaled production scoringliliIdentify and develop new modeling techniques andor technologies to complement existing ML processes and improve extraction rates and confidenceliliMeasure improve and validate confidence scores through rigorous and continuous testingliliImprove verification and validation functionalityliliApply machine learning and data science techniques and design distributed systemsliulpbrppemSKILLS AND EXPERIENCEempullistrongBachelors Degree in Computer Science or Engineeringstronglilistrong3 years software development experience in a professional work environmentstrongliliStrong software engineering background with emphasis in data science and machine learningliliExperience in some of the following ML frameworks Tensorflow pandas pytorch xgboost numpy keras scikitlearn dask sparkliliDemonstrable knowledge and understanding of Statistics and Deep Learning conceptsliliUnderstanding of probability and statistics and machine learning concepts such as precision recall optimization hyperparameter tuning overfitting and interpretabilityliliUnderstanding of how components and processes work together and communicate with each other using library calls RESTful APIs queueingmessaging systems and database queriesliliFamiliar with SQL and able to createperform basic queriesliliFluent in Linux based systems Docker and code versioning and professional development and encourage employees to take ownership become subject matter experts and bring new ideas to the table to challenge themselves and their teammatesliliEnjoyable working
